items.title: Neil Druckmann Ends The Last Of Us ‘Cure’ Debate, Is Wrong
items.description: Neil Druckmann has addressed an infamous The Last of Us debate. He is also very wrong, despite what he's saying about the Firefly Cure.

items.title: AI's Manufacturing Renaissance: Why The Future Of Value Creation Will Return To Making Things
items.description: The great economic transformations that built modern prosperity weren't driven by services but by industrial revolutions.

items.title: Case Study: Defense-In-Depth Even More Important In A Quantum World
items.description: This strategy is important in quantum computing, when power and speed will have the ability to wreak havoc on data security.

items.title: Make America Tan Again: “Big, Beautiful Bill” Burns The Tanning Tax
items.description: Tucked among the trillions of dollars in tax cuts in the House’s just passed “big, beautiful bill” is repeal of a 10% tax on tanning services.

items.title: Ransomware Kill Chain Whacked As FBI, Secret Service, Europol Attack
items.description: Ransomware attacks just got harder to pull off.
